title: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel set in the Roaring Twenties that explores themes of decadence and excess.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South, seen through the eyes of a young girl.
A dystopian novel that delves into totalitarianism and surveillance.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A story about teenage alienation and loss of innocence.

title: Brave New World
description: A dystopian novel that explores a future society driven by technological advancements and consumerism.

title: The Hobbit
description: A fantasy novel about the adventures of Bilbo Baggins in Middle-earth.

title: The Catch-22
description: A satirical novel set during World War II that critiques bureaucracy and war.

title: The Alchemist
description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd's journey to discover his personal legend.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: A novel about a young man's Faustian bargain with his own portrait.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: An epic fantasy novel that follows the quest to destroy the One Ring.

title: The Chronicles of Narnia
description: A series of seven fantasy novels set in the magical land of Narnia.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
description: A novel about the struggles of a family during the Great Depression.

title: The Old Man and the Sea
description: A short novel about an aging fisherman and his struggle to catch a giant marlin.

title: The Bell Jar
description: A semi-autobiographical novel about a young woman's descent into mental illness.

title: The Road
description: A post-apocalyptic novel about a father and son's journey through a desolate landscape.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
description: A novel about two teenagers who fall in love while dealing with cancer.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic novel about the romantic entanglements of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
description: The diary of a Jewish girl hiding from the Nazis during World War II.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
description: A comedic science fiction series that follows the misadventures of Arthur Dent.

title: The Shining
description: A horror novel about a family staying in an isolated hotel with a dark past.

title: The Da Vinci Code
description: A mystery thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon as he uncovers secrets hidden in famous artworks.
